post.title: New Compilation: Losers
post.fullText: {~i~}Losers{~/i~} is a series of noise pieces inspired by Thomas Bernhard's novel {~i~}The Loser{~/i~} made over four years.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/losers"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Podcast: After Silence
post.fullText: After Silence is a new podcast by Connor Kurtz which features curated mixed of experimental music. It is available for free on Bandcamp.{~br /~}{~br /~}{~a target="_blank" href="https://aftersilencepodcast.bandcamp.com/"~}https://aftersilencepodcast.bandcamp.com/{~/a~}

post.title: New Album: Barnett Newman
post.fullText: {~i~}Barnett Newman{~/i~} is the final entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/barnett-newman"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Short Film: The Exhibition Shaded Into a Vast Amusement Park
New Album: Philip Guston
post.fullText: {~i~}Philip Guston{~/i~} is the second entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/philip-guston"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Short Film: Fish & Soos
New Album: Piet Mondrian
post.fullText: {~i~}Piet Mondrian{~/i~} is the first entry in a trilogy of electroacoustic compositions dedicated to visual artists.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/piet-mondrian"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: Iodine
post.fullText: {~i~}Iodine{~/i~} is a series of 100 short, sequentiel pieces which flow between various styles of experimental electronic music.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/iodine"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: Frozen Tower of Sound
post.fullText: {~i~}Frozen Tower of Sound{~/i~} is a 60-minute electronic composition constructed of several layered digital textures to create the sensation of a fictional, electronic landscape.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/frozen-tower-of-sound"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Compilation: Miscellaneous Works, 2019
post.fullText: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2019{~/i~} collects several electronic compositions made throughout the year of 2019.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2019"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: Nine Feedbacks
post.fullText: {~i~}Nine Feedbacks{~/i~} is a 190-minute drone composition which flows through nine recordings of untouched electronic feedback in a randomized order. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/nine-feedbacks"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Short Film: Appearing
Two New Albums: You Had Better Come on Home / Organ Memories
post.fullText: {~i~}You Had Better Come on Home{~/i~} is a single hour-long piece comprised of processed field recordings, sine tones and white noise. It develops an electronic drone and invites it to act as an electronic guide on a journey to, from or through one's home (be that a place, state of mind or something else). {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://rateyourmusic.com/release/album/important-hair/you-had-better-come-on-home/"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.{~br /~}{~br /~} {~i~}Organ Memories{~/i~} started as a series of turntable improvisations using a box of organ records. Those improvisations were then used as sound material for four 15-minute electroacoustic compositions, which can be heard here. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/organ-memories"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Short Film: A Digital Triptych
New Short Film: Vehicles in Transit
New Compilation: Miscellaneous Works, 2018
post.fullText: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2018{~/i~} collects several electronic compositions made throughout the year of 2018.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2018"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Short Film: Music at 5,000 Hz
post.fullText: An abstract film captured on a cellphone set to music at 5,000 Hz. Available for free on Vimeo.{~br /~}{~br /~}{~a target="_blank" href="https://vimeo.com/307972346"~}https://vimeo.com/307972346{~/a~}

post.title: New Album: G. GOULD
post.fullText: {~i~}G. GOULD{~/i~} is a 45-minute composition based on a single field recording with sparse manipulations and collaging. It is a reaction to and partial recreation of James Benning's recent film {~i~}L. COHEN{~/i~}, as well as a reaction to the impact that artists like Leonard Cohen and Glenn Gould have had on Canadian culture. {~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/g-gould"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: 180510.180528.180602.
post.fullText: {~i~}180510.180528.180602.{~/i~} is a 60-minute reductionist electronic composition which focuses on the mutation of filtered textures over time.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/180510180528180602"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: Plein Soleil
post.fullText: {~i~}Plein Soleil{~/i~} is a 69-minute electronic composition, constructed exclusively from sounds extracted from the song of the same name by world's end girlfriend.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/plein-soleil"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Blog Launches
post.fullText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music Reviews blog has gone live. The first two reviews, of the two latest albums from Michael Pisaro, are available now.{~br /~}{~br /~}Check out the new blog here: {~a target="_blank" href="http://connorkurtzmusic.blogspot.ca/"~}http://connorkurtzmusic.blogspot.ca/{~/a~}
post.shortText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music Reviews blog has gone live.

post.title: New Compilation: Miscellaneous Works, 2017
post.fullText: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2017{~/i~} collects several compositions, collages, experiments and electronic improvisations made throughout the year of 2017.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2017"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Project: Good Old Neon
post.fullText: A new project has began between brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. The first album, {~i~}Musik kann marschieren{~/i~}, is available now on Bachelors of Science Records.{~br /~}{~br /~}Hear it for free, here: {~a target="_blank" href="https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2"~}https://wisteriatn.bandcamp.com/album/musik-kann-marschieren-2{~/a~}
post.shortText: A new project has began between brothers Connor and Owen Kurtz. The first album is available now.

post.title: Website Launches
post.fullText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music website was launched.
post.shortText: Today, the Connor Kurtz Music website was launched.

post.title: New Double Album: Lines 1 & 2
post.fullText: {~i~}Lines 1 & 2{~/i~} includes the first two realizations of Lines, a randomized situation for sound collage, each taking its own disc. The {~i~}Lines{~/i~} system ensures a constant shift of sonic density in the realization, as well as making it so the realization is completely circular, having no beginning or ending. The first realization uses electronic noise and the second uses everyday recordings.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/lines-1-2"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Double Album: First Snow
post.fullText: {~i~}First Snow{~/i~} is the first double album by Important Hair and the debut release of compositions by Connor Kurtz. It includes {~i~}First Snow{~/i~}, an analogue synthesizer piece which is realized in an hour-long solo edit and a 20-minute trio edit, {~i~}9 Movements{~/i~}, a minimalist work for electronic keyboard, {~i~}For On Kawara{~/i~}, a tribute to the conceptual minimalist performed on three live sources of static, and {~i~}The Death of John Cage{~/i~}, an original poem which becomes the basis of a sound collage.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/first-snow"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Compilation: Miscellaneous Works, 2016
post.fullText: {~i~}Miscellaneous Works, 2016{~/i~} is the first installment in Important Hair's annual {~i~}Miscellaneous Works{~/i~} series. It includes 8 tracks, including colleges, improvisations and a composition for acoustic guitars.{~br /~}{~br /~}The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/miscellaneous-works-2016"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.

post.title: New Album: You Are Crying, My Child
post.fullText: {~i~}You Are Crying, My Child{~/i~} is the debut release of Connor Kurtz's Important Hair project. It is a venture into the more experimental side of analog electronic noise. The album is partially written, partially improvised and partially collaged, using lyrics extracted from Samuel Beckett's 1938 novel {~i~}Murphy.{~/i~}{~br /~}{~br /~} The album is available for free download on the {~a target="_blank" href="https://importanthair.bandcamp.com/album/you-are-crying-my-child"~}Important Hair bandcamp{~/a~}.
